summary: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face off against a new supernatural threat, while Professor Bruttenholm (Sir John Hurt) must investigate the possible reemergence of a vampire he had slain decades prior.
cast: Ron Perlman|Selma Blair|John Hurt|Doug Jones|Peri Gilpin|J. Grant Albrecht|Jim Cummings|Grey Griffin|Rob Paulsen|DeeDee Rescher|Kath Soucie|Cree Summer|James Arnold Taylor
title: Hellboy Animated: Blood and Iron
